data.title: Airtel Digital TV DTH channels 2024: Full list, channel number, price, and more
data.meta_description: Here's a quick look at all the channels available on Airtel DTH along with their channel number and price
data.text:
Airtel Digital TV is a widely known DTH service provider in India with millions of monthly active users. It offers tons of channels across various categories including regional-specific ones that subscribers have complete control to add or remove from the plan. Besides that, Airtel’s Xstream set-top box lends users access to OTT and internet-based apps for additional entertainment on TV. In this article, we’ve compiled a list of all the Airtel DTH channels along with their price. So in case you’re looking for the channel number of your favourite channel, have a look down below.

Airtel DTH channel list 2024

Following is the list of all channels available on Airtel Digital TV DTH across categories and genres, including entertainment, movies, sports, news, fashion, and others.

English entertainment channel list with number

FAQs

How many channels are available in the Airtel DTH Channel List?

There are 560+ channels currently available on Airtel DTH. The channels are spread across various categories which include entertainment, movies, news, sports, fashion, lifestyle, and regional languages.

How can I subscribe to a new channel in the Airtel DTH Channel List?

New channels can be added to your Airtel DTH through SMS using your registered mobile number. Here’s how.

Open the SMS app on your mobile and type ADD <Channel Number> and send it to 54325

After that, you will receive a confirmation for the same on the same SMS

Shortly after, the channel will be added to your DTH plan

Apart from that, users can also subscribe to new channels using the Airtel Thanks app through the ‘Services’ tab.

Can I view the program guide for each channel on the Airtel DTH Channel List?

Yes, the program guide for each channel can be viewed by pressing the ‘guide’ button of present on the set-top box’s remote. From here, you can get to know the current and upcoming programs for every channel available on Airtel DTH.

Are there any interactive channels available on the Airtel DTH Channel List?

Yes, Airtel DTH comes with the following interactive radio channels:

Bhakti

International Hits

Pujabi HIts

Bolly Hits

Romantic Hits

Special-80’s Hits

Gazals

Kannada

Bhojpuri

Malayalam

Tamil Hits

Telugu Hits

These channels can be accessed by pressing the ‘iTV’ button on the remote and then selecting ‘iMusicSpace’.

Is there an option to temporarily suspend my Airtel DTH subscription?

Airtel DTH subscribers can temporarily disable their subscription by giving a call to customer care at 12150 from their Airtel mobile number and ask them to suspend the service. Alternatively, customer care can also be reached out on the 24×7 helpline number 1800-103-6065.
